channel.title: All About Everything
channel.description: All About Everything is a show about everything. Each week we dive into any subject known to man and talk about it as much as we can. Look for our podcast in the Podcasts app or in the iTunes Store
channel.itunes:subtitle: A show about everything
channel.itunes:summary: All About Everything is a show about everything. Each week we dive into any subject known to man and talk about it as much as we can. Look for our podcast in the Podcasts app or in the iTunes Store
channel.itunes:author: John Doe

item.title: Red,Whine, & Blue
item.description: This week we talk about surviving in a Red state if you are a Blue person. Or vice versa.
item.itunes:subtitle: Red + Blue != Purple
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about surviving in a Red state if you are a Blue person. Or vice versa.
item.itunes:author: Various

item.title: The Best Chili
item.description: This week we talk about the best Chili in the world. Which chili is better?
item.itunes:subtitle: Jane and Eric
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about the best Chili in the world. Which chili is better?
item.itunes:author: Jane Doe

item.title: Socket Wrench Shootout
item.description: This week we talk about metric vs. Old English socket wrenches. Which one is better? Do you really need both? Get all of your answers here.
item.itunes:subtitle: Comparing socket wrenches is fun!
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about metric vs. Old English socket wrenches. Which one is better? Do you really need both? Get all of your answers here.
item.itunes:author: Jane Doe

item.title: Shake Shake Shake Your Spices
item.description: This week we talk about salt and pepper shakers, comparing and contrasting pour rates, construction materials, and overall aesthetics. Come and join the party!
item.itunes:subtitle: A short primer on table spices
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about salt and pepper shakers, comparing and contrasting pour rates, construction materials, and overall aesthetics. Come and join the party!
item.itunes:author: John Doe
